intro: Chelonanthera miniata, commonly known as the miniature chelonanthera, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its small, delicate flowers that typically range in color from white to pale pink. The plant has finely divided, fern-like leaves that are often aromatic. It thrives in moist, well-drained soils and prefers partial to full sunlight. Chelonanthera miniata is often found in woodland areas and along stream banks in its native habitat.
